title: What Is The Role Of Diksa Guru In ISKCON? | His Grace Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.text: Hare Krishna! Vishwaguru Srila Prabhupada ki Jai!

In 1978, after Srila Prabhupada's disappearance, the GBC of Vizcon decided to implement an unauthorized guru system by elevating 11 devotees as zonal acharyas and diksha gurus, declaring that they had overnight become pure devotees.
Over the years, this unauthorized guru system has failed the devotees, with almost 75 gurus falling from grace till date.
In reaction to the constant guru fall-downs, the GBC has been chopping and changing the unauthorized guru system as well as their understanding of the functions, qualifications and characteristics.
In the year 1999, the GBC passed Resolution No. 405, titled Standards of Guru Worship in ISKCON, and the GBC made it into a law in ISKCON.
It has become an ISKCON law.
As part of this ISKCON law, the GBC resolved, under subsection C of this Resolution No. 405,
in order to offer appropriate respect to Srila Prabhupada as founder acharya and pre-eminent spiritual master of ISKCON.
